seo.whatIsTitle: What is AI-powered image editing and how does it work?
seo.whatIsContent: **AI-powered image editing** uses **artificial intelligence** and **computer vision** to understand and modify images based on **natural language descriptions**. This technology combines **machine learning models** trained on **millions of images** with **text-to-image generation** capabilities to perform **intelligent photo manipulation**. AI image editing can **change backgrounds**, **add or remove objects**, **apply artistic styles**, **adjust colors and lighting**, and **enhance image quality** using **deep learning algorithms**. This revolutionary approach to **photo editing** makes **professional-quality modifications** accessible to **everyone** through **simple text commands**. Learn more about [generative AI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Generative_artificial_intelligence) and [computer vision](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer_vision).
seo.howToTitle: How to use the AI Image Editor tool?
howToSteps: **Upload your image** - it stays in your browser, never uploaded to servers
**Describe the changes** you want using natural language (e.g., 'change background to beach at sunset')
Click **'Edit'** to process your image with AI
seo.useCasesTitle: Common use cases for AI image editing
useCases: **Background replacement** - change environments, add scenic locations, or remove distractions
**Object manipulation** - add/remove elements, change clothing, or modify scene composition
**Artistic transformation** - apply painting styles, filters, or creative effects
**Photo enhancement** - adjust lighting, colors, and visual appeal automatically
**Professional content** - create marketing images, social media posts, and brand visuals

faq.question: How realistic are AI image edits?
faq.answer: AI edits can be **very realistic** for **background changes, style transfers, and color adjustments**. However, **complex object additions** or **dramatic scene changes** may show **subtle artifacts** or **unnatural elements**. Results improve with **clear descriptions** and **high-quality source images**.

faq.question: Can AI edit any type of image?
faq.answer: AI editing works best with **clear, well-lit photographs** with **distinct subjects**. It may struggle with **low-resolution images, complex scenes, or artistic photos** with **strong creative styling**. **Portraits, landscapes, and product photos** typically yield the **best results**.

faq.question: Is my image data private during AI editing?
faq.answer: Yes! **Images are processed locally** in your browser using your **Google Gemini API key**. Original images are **never uploaded** to our servers - only **processed results** may be sent to Google's AI for analysis. This ensures **complete privacy** of your **personal photos and content**.

seo.useCasesTitle: Casos de uso comunes de edici√≥n de im√°genes con IA

faq.question: ¬øQu√© tan realistas son las ediciones de IA?
faq.answer: Las ediciones de IA pueden ser **muy realistas** para **cambios de fondo, transferencias de estilo y ajustes de color**. Sin embargo, **addiciones complejas de objetos** o **cambios dram√°ticos de escena** pueden mostrar **artifacts sutiles** o **elementos no naturales**. Puede luchar con **im√°genes de baja resoluci√≥n, escenas complejas, o fotos art√≠sticas** con **estilos creativos fuertes**. **Retratos, paisajes y fotos de productos** t√≠picamente rinden los **mejores resultados**.

faq.question: ¬øMis datos de imagen son privados durante la edici√≥n con IA?
